settings.tab_content_1:
Riding pants aren't created equal. Like you, most riders searching for the perfect riding pants give up and decide their everyday jeans are the answer.  Why? Because riding pants have bulky padding, uncomfortable material, overpriced, and just look bad.
We used to say the same thing until we got burned, literally. Like over 20,000 riders each year, we experienced road rash.

So, we set out to create protective motorcycle pants so stylish, comfortable, and versatile you’ll never want to take them off.
settings.tab_content_2:
Our premium 11-ounce denim is blended with polyester to keep you cool and 3% spandex to add flex in all the right places.

  • Road Rash Resistant
  • CE approved Removable knee & hip protectors included
  • Slim straight fit
  • Elastic accordion panels on knees & lower back
  • Cargo Flap Pockets
  • Light Herringbone pattern
  • YKK® Zipper
  • 70% Cotton, 28% Polyester, 2% Spandex
settings.tab_content_3:
WE RECOMMEND SIZING DOWN FROM YOUR REGULAR PANT SIZE!

Please measure your favorite jeans at home and compare it to the size chart below before placing your order.

Our model in all pictures above is 5'11" 180lbs and wears a size 30

settings.tab_content_4:
• Machine washable.
  • Remove pads before washing.
  • Wash with cold water.
  • No bleach.
  • Hang to dry.
  • Warm iron is OK.
settings.tab_content_5: All purchases come with a 30-day satisfaction guarantee and free ground shipping for all orders over $100. We offer prepaid shipping labels for all returns & exchanges. Because you have enough to worry about. Buy with confidence!

settings.trinity:
The HOLY TRINITY OF PROTECTION, STYLE & COMFORT.

  • straight slim fit to keep you looking good
  • spandex for a stretchy and comfortable fit
  • removeable CE armor to keep you safe

settings.heading: Nick’s Story
settings.description:
Why I made the pants

80% of bikers don’t protect their legs? Why? Riding pants are overpriced, bulky, uncomfortable, and just look lame.

I used to say the same thing until I got burned, literally. Like over 20,000 riders each year, I laid my bike down and crashed...right into a brick wall. I was only wearing regular jeans because I hated all the riding pants I tried on. This was the worst thing that every happened to me on a bike.

So, I set out to create protective motorcycle pants so stylish, comfortable, and versatile you’ll never want to take them off.

STYLE & SAFETY REDEFINED™

License To Ride pants offer the perfect combination of style and protection. Not to mention unmatched comfort. Whether you're on the move or off the bike these pants are always ready -- because our LTR's don't take a break, even when you do.

settings.heading: RIDE SAFE
settings.description:
We found the secret to comfort & quality

Turns out, the secret to making pants that feel incredibly comfortable and make you look good comes down to three key things:

  1. We make the pants with designer grade 11 oz denim, but also 2% spandex. This keeps things stretchy.
  2. We precisely calculate the spandex ratio, so that the pants are not too stretchy and not too firm.
  3. We make every pair with quality that will last you years. It’s easy to find cheap denim that falls apart after a few washes. We’ve engineered the LTR’s to hold up for years.

settings.heading: LOOK GOOD, FEEL GOOD
settings.description:
Protection built for the ride & the destination

With removable CE-approved knee & hip armor, the LTR’s are designed to keep you safe on the bike and ready for wherever you’re headed after the ride. The CE-approved seal means that our pants are tested in certified facilities and surpass standards for use on race tracks.

settings.heading: THE MOST AFFORDABLE RIDING PANTS
settings.description:
MADE AT A FAIR PRICE

You shouldn’t have to pay $300+ for riding pants. We made it our mission to create pants that help you look good, be safe, and feel comfortable for a reasonable price. They still aren’t cheap, but you’ll wear our LTR’s for every ride and they cost way less the competition.
